title: Foliage Folio
content: A web application that allows users to manage a database of their plants and track when they water them.

title: Beauty Product API
content: A website where users can engage with two API's: to search for Sephora products, and learn about their ingredients.

title: Beth Jarrett: A Portfolio
content: Designed to mimic a notebook, my portfolio showcases my work, and services my ego.
